mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CS_TB WHERE writer = #{id} ORDER BY cs_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CS_TB (cs_num, writer, category, title, content, confirm, regdate) VALUES(cs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{confirm}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT faq_num,writer,title,content,viewCount,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(faq_num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum FROM CS_TB) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
